DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore effect cook navy bean powder rice bran consumption stool microbiome metabolome colorectal cancer survivor healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: Beans/Bran Enriching Nutritional Eating For Intestinal Health Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : 1 . To learn increase cooked navy bean powder rice bran dietary intake affect stool microbiota colorectal cancer survivor healthy adult . 2 . To determine whether cooked navy bean powder rice bran consumption modulate microbial metabolism . 3 . To observe dietary change blood , urine stool metabolite profile inflammatory cytokine .

BMI 2535 previous concurrent malignancy except adequately treat basal cell squamous cell skin cancer , situ cervical cancer cancer patient disease free five year . Ability complete questionnaire ( ) dietary food log Willingness consume meals/snacks provide 28 consecutive day Drink less equal one alcoholic drink/day History food allergy and/or major dietary restriction Pregnant lactate plan become pregnant Self identify smoker Taking prescribed medication control lipids Taking BeanO , antiflatulence medication prolong antibiotic use ( one month ) Have history gallstone .
